header_text: You meet a new staff member in your work meeting, and they ask if you have Facebook. When you tell them that you don't have Facebook, they grow quiet. They could be brainstorming other ways to contact you, and this makes you feel happy.

elements.Text: Did the new person at work get quiet because they were judging you?

elements.name: You meet a new staff member in your work meeting, and they ask if you have Facebook. When you tell them that you don't have Facebook, they grow quiet. They could be brainstorming other ways to contact you, and this makes you feel happy._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
